name: Dawn Of The Bone
description:
Take on the role of a Lich who wants nothing more than to be left alone. But his peaceful stay in the middle of the desert is interrupted when a portal opens near his citadel. So there's only one thing to do - throw skeletons at it until the problem is solved. After all, it worked every time so far.

-11 different units.
-3 groups of people to discover and interact with.
-20 different endings.
-Roughly 10 minutes per playthrough.
